resources.string: "No mail accounts available. Tap to add a mail account."
The account assigned to this widget has been deleted. Would you like to switch to another account?

"Hi there! Congratulations on setting up your new HTC phone.
Please tap anywhere on this message to set up your email account.
All the best, HTC"

"Hi there! Congratulations on setting up your new HTC phone.
Please tap anywhere on this message to assign a Mail account to this widget.
All the best, HTC"
Browse your mail right on your home screen with the Mail widgets. Choose from preview or list styles.
